pair.name: TV Name
pair.ip_hint: Is the MAC address correct but the IP address not? Change it now or after completing the addition in the device settings.
pair.help: Make sure your TV is switched ON and connected to the Internet. To improve stability, give the TV a static IP address (selected IP address must not be used by another device!)
pair.maunalhint: Hint: Homey will not automatically search for a new IP address for the TV unless you enter the MAC manually.
